author: "Eric Anku"
format: html

```{r load-packages}
# Load packages
pacman::p_load(
  tidyverse, # Data wrangling and visualisation
  skimr, # Skim data
  gtsummary, # Table summary
  rio, # Import and export dataset
  here, # File management
  janitor # Clean names
)
```

```{r import-dataset}
# Import dataset
df <- import(here("data","mortality_data.xlsx"), skip = 5)
```


```{r clean-names}
# Clean column names
df <- clean_names(df)
```

```{r de-identify-dataset}
# Remove PII columns and redundant columns
df <- df |> 
  select(-c(
    patient_name,
    patient_number,
    mobile,
    address,
    emergency_contact,
    emergency_contact_name,
    mortuary_patient_tag,
    mortuary_out_date,
    mortuary_added_date,
    action
  ))
```

```{r skim-dataset}
# Skim dataset
df |>
  skim()
```

```{r glimpse-dataset}
# Glimpse dataset
df |>
  glimpse()
```
